RelatedSentence: the last flight to riyadh will be operated on september 28 2014 and the last flight to cairo will be operated on september 30 2014 said an airline statement .
it said the ' difficult decision to suspend the services was taken as a result of the sustained weak performance of both routes .

A1: confirmed tickets issued prior to today
RelatedSentence: according to the statement customers holding confirmed tickets issued prior to today for travel to and from riyadh and cairo after september 28 and september 30 respectively will be eligible for refunds without administrative fees or penalties .
efforts will be made to contact affected customers to offer alternative travel options said the press release .
